card.name: CW - debt review applications where Standard Bank is listed as a creditor

data.text: Yasser the report, did you only include Standard Bank? Can you provide a report with all Standard Bank variants (e.g. STD Bank, etc). Anthony said the figures are too low. Let me know if you want an amended log, as I am aware that the request was sent through only requesting Standard Bank. Email report to me please. @yasserogier
